name: Spirit Breaker
title: Barathrum
lore: From the elemental plane, Barathrum charges across the battlefield to bash his enemies.

chargeOfDarkness.name: Charge of Darkness
chargeOfDarkness.description: Spirit Breaker charges at a target, gaining speed and stunning on impact.

bulldoze.name: Bulldoze
bulldoze.description: Grants bonus movement speed and status resistance for a duration.

greaterBash.name: Greater Bash
greaterBash.description: Attacks have a chance to bash, dealing bonus damage and pushing enemies back.

netherStrike.name: Nether Strike
netherStrike.description: Teleports to an enemy and delivers a devastating Greater Bash.
